DataElement.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator Incentive Participating Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the specified free-text field related to the benefit or consideration, financial or otherwise, given to a researcher for participating with the PEARL network, an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the benefit or consideration, financial or otherwise, given to a researcher for participating with the PEARL network, an infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Investigator
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.:a researcher in a clinical trial or clinical study.

Concepts.longName: Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network
Concepts.definition: An infrastructure to conduct office-based research that will answer the questions facing general dental practitioners in the routine care of their patients.

An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.

Property.preferredDefinition: No value exists.:Taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: The act of taking part in an activity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: groups, institutions, or clinical facilities that conduct clinical research or tests, or analyze clinical data.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field to related to protocol administration.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.
